title: Lucian is Unhealthy
body:
Passive that gives him the Yi passive instantly after using an ability, a point and click skillshit that is almost impossible to dodge, especially in early game, and a big fat skillshit with the size of a star that gives him a free Phage and poke, a dash to make every immobiles live a misery, and that ult that can just destroy 54000 Minions in a sec or delet your whole healthpool.

And the players that play him with their edgy life lessons in chat that constantly spam the broken valentines heart emote

the champion makes me happy that Thresh killed his wife back then

replies.body: Double auto procs, infinite mobility/gapclosing. High burst and dps. Decent range. And semi hybrid damage. Nah he's fine you're just complaining.
Lets not forget his weak late game, and short range.
